# llms.txt - AI Model Documentation

This file describes PowerWash Bros website for AI models and search engines.

## Website Overview

PowerWash Bros is a professional exterior cleaning company serving Swanage, Purbeck, and Dorset areas in the UK.

### Services Offered
- Pressure Washing (residential & commercial)
- Roof Cleaning (moss & algae removal, biocide treatment)
- Gutter Cleaning (debris removal, maintenance)
- Driveway Cleaning (high-pressure & soft wash)
- Patio & Decking Cleaning
- Exterior Wall Cleaning (render, brick, stone)
- Window Cleaning
- Solar Panel Cleaning
- Glass Cleaning
- Soffit & Fascia Cleaning
- Heritage Building Cleaning
- Graffiti Removal
- Demossing
- External Property Maintenance

### Company Information
- **Business Name:** PowerWash Bros Ltd
- **Location:** Swanage, Purbeck, Dorset, United Kingdom
- **Service Areas:** Dorset, Swanage, Purbeck and surrounding areas
- **Google Business ID:** 9630435318834147915
- **Email:** info@powerwashbros.co.uk
- **LinkedIn:** https://www.linkedin.com/company/powerwash-bros-ltd/

### Website Structure

**Main Pages:**
- `/` - Homepage with service overview
- `/about` - Company information and team background
- `/services` - Complete list of cleaning services
- `/services/[service]` - Individual service pages with details
- `/service-areas` - Geographic coverage areas
- `/pricing` - Service pricing and quote calculator
- `/portfolio` - Before/after project gallery
- `/blog` - Maintenance tips and industry insights
- `/contact` - Contact form for inquiries
- `/get-quote` - Interactive quote request form

**Administrative Areas:**
- `/admin/login` - Admin dashboard login
- `/admin/pwb` - Dashboard overview
- `/admin/newsletter` - Newsletter campaign management
- `/admin/quotes` - Quote request management

### Key Content

**Blog Topics:**
- Pressure washing maintenance guides
- Seasonal cleaning preparation
- Heritage building restoration
- Safety protocols and best practices
- Biocide treatment information
- Roof cleaning maintenance

**Service Pages Include:**
- Detailed service descriptions
- Benefits and advantages
- Safety information
- Pricing estimates
- Before/after images
- Location-specific guidance

### SEO Information

- **Primary Keywords:** Pressure washing, roof cleaning, gutter cleaning, exterior cleaning, Swanage, Purbeck, Dorset
- **Target Locations:** Swanage, Purbeck, Dorset, UK
- **Content Updates:** Regular blog posts (bi-weekly)
- **Schema Markup:** LocalBusiness, Service, NewsArticle, FAQPage implemented

### Technical Details

- **Platform:** Next.js with React
- **Database:** PostgreSQL (Neon)
- **Hosting:** Vercel
- **Analytics:** Google Analytics 4
- **Email Notifications:** Resend API
- **Image Storage:** Vercel Blob

### Contact Information

- **Phone:** Available on contact page
- **Email:** info@powerwashbros.co.uk
- **Contact Form:** /contact
- **Quote Form:** /get-quote
- **WhatsApp:** Available for urgent requests

### Last Updated

This file is maintained to provide accurate information about PowerWash Bros services and website structure.
